verses.name: Matthew 1:1
verses.text: The book of the generation of Jesus Christ, the son of David, the son of Abraham.

verses.name: Matthew 1:2
verses.text: Abraham begat Isaac; and Isaac begat Jacob; and Jacob begat Judas and his brethren;

verses.name: Matthew 1:3
verses.text: And Judas begat Phares and Zara of Thamar; and Phares begat Esrom; and Esrom begat Aram;

verses.name: Matthew 1:4
verses.text: And Aram begat Aminadab; and Aminadab begat Naasson; and Naasson begat Salmon;

verses.name: Matthew 1:5
verses.text: And Salmon begat Booz of Rachab; and Booz begat Obed of Ruth; and Obed begat Jesse;

verses.name: Matthew 1:6
verses.text: And Jesse begat David the king; and David the king begat Solomon of her that had been the wife of Urias;

verses.name: Matthew 1:7
verses.text: And Solomon begat Roboam; and Roboam begat Abia; and Abia begat Asa;

verses.name: Matthew 1:8
verses.text: And Asa begat Josaphat; and Josaphat begat Joram; and Joram begat Ozias;

verses.name: Matthew 1:9
verses.text: And Ozias begat Joatham; and Joatham begat Achaz; and Achaz begat Ezekias;

verses.name: Matthew 1:10
verses.text: And Ezekias begat Manasses; and Manasses begat Amon; and Amon begat Josias;

verses.name: Matthew 1:11
verses.text: And Josias begat Jechonias and his brethren, about the time they were carried away to Babylon:

verses.name: Matthew 1:12
verses.text: And after they were brought to Babylon, Jechonias begat Salathiel; and Salathiel begat Zorobabel;

verses.name: Matthew 1:13
verses.text: And Zorobabel begat Abiud; and Abiud begat Eliakim; and Eliakim begat Azor;

verses.name: Matthew 1:14
verses.text: And Azor begat Sadoc; and Sadoc begat Achim; and Achim begat Eliud;

verses.name: Matthew 1:15
verses.text: And Eliud begat Eleazar; and Eleazar begat Matthan; and Matthan begat Jacob;

verses.name: Matthew 1:16
verses.text: And Jacob begat Joseph the husband of Mary, of whom was born Jesus, who is called Christ.

verses.name: Matthew 1:17
verses.text: So all the generations from Abraham to David are fourteen generations; and from David until the carrying away into Babylon are fourteen generations; and from the carrying away into Babylon unto Christ are fourteen generations.

verses.name: Matthew 1:18
verses.text: Now the birth of Jesus Christ was on this wise: When as his mother Mary was espoused to Joseph, before they came together, she was found with child of the Holy Ghost.

verses.name: Matthew 1:19
verses.text: Then Joseph her husband, being a just man, and not willing to make her a publick example, was minded to put her away privily.

verses.name: Matthew 1:20
verses.text: But while he thought on these things, behold, the angel of the Lord appeared unto him in a dream, saying, Joseph, thou son of David, fear not to take unto thee Mary thy wife: for that which is conceived in her is of the Holy Ghost.

verses.name: Matthew 1:21
verses.text: And she shall bring forth a son, and thou shalt call his name JESUS: for he shall save his people from their sins.

verses.name: Matthew 1:22
verses.text: Now all this was done, that it might be fulfilled which was spoken of the Lord by the prophet, saying,

verses.name: Matthew 1:23
verses.text: Behold, a virgin shall be with child, and shall bring forth a son, and they shall call his name Emmanuel, which being interpreted is, God with us.

verses.name: Matthew 1:24
verses.text: Then Joseph being raised from sleep did as the angel of the Lord had bidden him, and took unto him his wife:

verses.name: Matthew 1:25
verses.text: And knew her not till she had brought forth her firstborn son: and he called his name JESUS.
